task.title: Map test cases between and Azure DevOps

taskbody.context: To map test cases between and Azure DevOps, do as follows:

step.cmd: You can view your test case IDs in a test suite in Azure Test Plans.

image.alt: View Test Case ID in Azure

step.cmd: Input one or more test case IDs of ADO. You can map one test case ID in with many test case IDs on ADO. IDs are separate by commas.
To check whether the test case ID is valid, click Verify.

taskbody.result:
You have successfully integrated Azure Test Plans with . After a test suite execution finishes, automatically adds a new test run and test results to the specified test plan.
New test results uploaded to Azure
You can also dynamically change the test plan ID, test run name, build and release definition IDs of a test run by using the command-line option. See .

tasktroubleshooting.p: When you cannot upload test results to Azure DevOps, you might encounter the following error in the Event Log: Cannot create test results for Azure DevOps Test Case ID=<test-case-ID> due to multiple Test Points returned.To solve this issue, you can check the IDs of the returned test points in the Event Log to readjust the test configuration; or allow sending test results anyway in project settings. See Allow multiple test results submission for multiple test points.
